content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from the AI to execute a shell command, but it returned a syntax error. I also executed other commands such as list_files, execute_python_file, read_file, and write_to_file, but the latter returned an error saying the file has already been updated. When I executed the execute_shell command, it returned a syntax error again.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename> failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: Syntax error: end of file unexpected\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: <text>', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: Error: File has already been updated.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "<command_line>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: Syntax error: end of file unexpected\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result')]
